citations.desc: Primary enclosures used to transport live animals.
citations.narrative:
Transport carriers for all animals were not marked on top and on at least one side with the words "Live Animal" or "Wild
Animal" and with markings to indicate the correct upright position of the enclosure.
Failure to label transport enclosures could result in improper handling and potential injury or discomfort to the animals.
Primary enclosures used to transport live animals must have a permanently affixed on top and on one or more sides with
the words "Live Animal" or "Wild Animal." These words must be 1 inch in height and have arrows or other marking to
indicate the correct upright position of the container.
Correct By: 3/5/25
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
Alexandra Calderon, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
3.137(e) 
   
Primary enclosures used to transport live animals. 
Transport carriers for all animals were not marked on top and on at least one side with the words "Live Animal" or "Wild 
Animal" and with markings to indicate the correct upright position of the enclosure. 
Failure to label transport enclosures could result in improper handling and potential injury or discomfort to the animals. 
Primary enclosures used to transport live animals must have a permanently affixed on top and on one or more sides with 
the words "Live Animal" or "Wild Animal." These words must be 1 inch in height and have arrows or other marking to 
indicate the correct upright position of the container. 
 
Correct By: 3/5/25 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors:
